BR_text.BRdescription:
when i try run lib\data_utils\amass_utils.py
 error:
 ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'lib'
 But you mentioned that throughout the documentation we refer to VIBE root folder as $ROOT.

comments_0.comment_text:
solution：
 export PYTHONPATH="$ROOT:$PYTHONPATH"
 example:
 export PYTHONPATH="/data/szx/VIBE:$PYTHONPATH"

comments_1.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/sorrowyn>@sorrowyn</denchmark-link>
  thanks for noting it. We will update README
